00027 void Boundary::init(int i, int j, REAL ymin[], REAL ymax[], int nspecies) {
00028         idir=i; iside=j; xmin=ymin; xmax=ymax;
00029         reactions=new Reaction[nspecies];
00030 }
00032 void Boundary::Inject(
00033         int ispecie,
00034         REAL vavx,//average velocity in one direction
00035         REAL temperature,
00036         Collection<Molecule> *molecules
00037 ) {
00038         Molecule *molecule=molecules->append();
00039         molecule->Type(ispecie);
00040         //Create random injection velocity:
00041 //-     REAL velx=vavx*fabs(Run::gauss());// actual velocity
00042         REAL velx=vavx*fabs(GAUSS);// actual velocity
00043         //Select position:
00044         REAL drift=numeric_limits<REAL>::epsilon()+velx*Run::time.step;//average drift from the boundary during time step
00045         if(iside==0) {
00046                 molecule->Coordinate(idir,xmin[idir]+drift);
00047                 molecule->Velocity(idir,velx);
00048         }       else if(iside==1) {
00049                 molecule->Coordinate(idir,xmax[idir]-drift);
00050                 molecule->Velocity(idir,-velx);
00051         }  else {
00052                 cerr<<"Inject: boundary not initialized\n";
00053                 exit(1);
00054         }
00055         molecule->Time(Run::time.current);
00056         REAL dx=0.5*species[ispecie].Size();
00057         molecule->TimeStep(velx>SMALL?dx/vavx:0.0);
00058         for(int i=1;i<DIM;i++) {
00059                 int j=(idir+i)%DIM;
00060                 REAL
00061                         x=xmin[j]+RND*(xmax[j]-xmin[j]),
00062 //-                     v=(2.0*RND-1.0)*velx;
00063 //-                     v=vavx*Run::gauss();
00064                         v=vavx*GAUSS;
00065                 molecule->Coordinate(j,x);
00066                 molecule->Velocity(j,v);
00067         }
00068         molecule->Temperature(temperature);
00069         GridContainer::put(molecule);
00070 }

00099         {       fprintf(stderr,"Empty document: %s\n",inpfilename);
00100                 xmlFreeDoc(doc);
00101                 return;
00102         }
00103         if (xmlStrcmp(root->name, (const xmlChar *) doctype))
00104         {       fprintf

00106                         "document of the wrong type, root node != %s in %s\n",
00107                         doctype,inpfilename
00108                 );

00110                 return;
00111         }

00114         (       xmlNodePtr cur = root->xmlChildrenNode;
00115                 cur != NULL; cur = cur->next
00116         ) {

00121                         strncpy(str,(char*)key,WORDLENGTH);
00122                         xmlFree(key);
00123                         int xterm=0;
00124                         sscanf(str,"%d",&xterm);
00125                         if(xterm!=0)Run::option.xterm=true;
00126                         else Run::option.xterm=false;

00128                                 printf("Xterm output: %d\n",xterm);fflush(stdout);

00141                         }
00142                         if(nmolecules>0) pool=new Pool<Molecule>(nmolecules);
00143                         else pool=new Pool<Molecule>(1);
00144                         molecules.init(nmolecules);
00145                 }
00147                 if ((!xmlStrcmp(cur->name, (const xmlChar *)"species"))) {
00148                         char title[MAXLINLEN];
00149                         if(getCharAttr(cur,(char*)"title",title)==0) {
00150                                 fprintf
00151                                 (       stderr,"CAN'T GET %s FOR %s IN %s\nAborting\n",
00152                                         "name","domain",inpfilename
00153                                 ); exit(1);
00154                         }

00156                         xmlNodePtr tag=cur->xmlChildrenNode;
00157                         //COUNT THE SPECIES:
00158                         nspecies=0;
00159                         while (tag != NULL) {
00160                                 if ((!xmlStrcmp(tag->name, (const xmlChar *)"specie")))
00161                                         nspecies++;
00162                                 tag=tag->next;
00163                         }
00164                         if(Run::option.verbose) printf("Number of species: %d\n",nspecies);
00165                         //ALLOCATE SPECIES:
00166                         species=new Specie[nspecies+1];

00170                         for (int isp=0;tag != NULL&&isp<nspecies;tag = tag->next) {
00171                                 Specie *specie=species+isp;

00173                                         xmlChar *key=xmlGetProp(tag,(const xmlChar *)"id");

00183                                         /*
00184                                                 For monotomic molecules dof=3.0, which corresponds to
00185                                                 cp=(3/2+1)*R = 5/2*R
00186                                                 since dof=2*cv/R=2*(cp/R-1)
00187                                                 where R=BoltzmanConstant*AvogadroNumber
00188                                                 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Specific_heat
00189                                                 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heat_capacity#Heat_capacity
00190                                         */
00191                                         REAL cp=parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"cp");// J/(mol*K)
00192                                         if(cp<=2.5*GasConstant)cp=2.5*GasConstant;//can't be less than 5/2*R

00197                                                         isp,species[isp].Id(),species[isp].Mass(),species[isp].Size(),cp
00198                                                 );fflush(stdout);
00199                                         }
00200                                         isp++;
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203                         strcpy(species[VOIDSPECIE].Id(),"VOID\0");

00225                                         while(isspace(*r))r++; while(isspace(*p))p++;

00227                                         for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*r);r++,w++) *w=*r; *w='\0';

00230                                         while(isspace(*r))r++;for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*r);r++,w++) *w=*r; *w='\0';

00236                                         while(*p!='\0'&&isspace(*p))p++;
00237                                         if(*p!='\0') {
00238                                                 for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*p);p++,w++) *w=*p; *w='\0';
00239                                                 for(ip1=0;ip1<nspecies;ip1++) if(strncmp(species[ip1].Id(),word,WORDLENGTH)==0) break;
00240                                         } else ip1=VOIDSPECIE;
00241                                         int ireact0=ir0*nspecies+ir1, ireact1=ir1*nspecies+ir0;
00242                                         //Different reaction outcomes
00243                                         Reaction *react0=reactions+ireact0, *react1=reactions+ireact1;
00244                                         react0->Add(ip0,ip1,activationEnergy,probability,enthalpy);
00245                                         react1->Add(ip0,ip1,activationEnergy,probability,enthalpy);
00246                                         //Inverse reaction: include explicitly, since hard to handle different outcomes
00247                                 }

00480                                                         char id[MAXLINLEN];
00481                                                         if(getCharAttr(tag,(char*)"id",id)) {
00482                                                                 if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00483                                                                         cout<<"\tBoundary Specie id="<<id<<endl;cout.flush();
00484                                                                 }
00485                                                                 //Locate the element by ID:
00486                                                                 Specie *specie=NULL;
00487                                                                 for(int isp=0;isp<nspecies;isp++) {
00488                                                                         Specie *spc=species+isp;
00489                                                                         if(strcmp(id,spc->Id())==0){
00490                                                                                 specie=spc;break;
00491                                                                         }
00492                                                                 }
00493                                                                 if(specie==NULL) {
00494                                                                         cerr<<"FAILED TO LOCATE SPECIE ID="<<id<<endl;
00495                                                                         exit(1);
00496                                                                 }
00497                                                                 //Append to the list of species
00498                                                         //-     boundary->species.append(specie);
00499                                                                 Gas *gas=new Gas(specie);
00500                                                                 boundary->gases.append(gas);
00501                                                                 REAL density=0.0;
00502                                                                 if(parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"density",density))
00503                                                                         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00504                                                                                 cout<<"\tDensity [kg/m^3]="<<density<<endl;
00505                                                                         }
00506                                                                 else
00507                                                                         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00508                                                                                 cout<<"Density not specified for specie "<<id<<", assumed 0\n";
00509                                                                         }
00510                                                                 gas->density=density;
00511                                                         }       else {
00512                                                                 cerr<<"No Specie ID specified in "<<inpfilename<<endl;
00513                                                                 exit(1);
00514                                                         }
00515                                                 }
00516                                                 else if(!xmlStrcmp(tag->name,(const xmlChar*)"reaction")) {
00518                                                         //Get Reactant Specie ID:
00519                                                         char reactant[WORDLENGTH],products[WORDLENGTH];
00520                                                         xmlChar *key=xmlGetProp(tag,(const xmlChar *)"reactant");
00521                                                         if(key==NULL){cerr<<"Keyword 'reactant' missing in boundary reaction tag\n";exit(1);}
00522                                                         strncpy(reactant,(char*)key,WORDLENGTH);
00523                                                         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00524                                                                         cout<<"\tBoundary Reactant ="<<reactant<<endl;cout.flush();
00525                                                         }
00526                                                         key=xmlGetProp(tag,(const xmlChar *)"products");
00527                                                         if(key==NULL){cerr<<"Keyword 'products' missing in boundary reaction tag\n";exit(1);}
00528                                                         strncpy(products,(char*)key,WORDLENGTH);
00529                                                         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00530                                                                 cout<<"\tBoundary Products ="<<products<<endl;cout.flush();
00531                                                         }
00532                                                         REAL
00533                                                                 activationEnergy=BoltzmannConstant/AtomicMassUnit*parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"activation"),
00534                                                                 probability=parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"probability"),
00538 #ifdef ADSORPTION
00539                                                                 residencetime=parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"time"),
00540 #endif
00541                                                                 enthalpy=parseFloat(doc,tag,(char*)"enthalpy");
00542                                                                 //Parse reactants and products strings:
00543                                                         char *r=reactant,*p=products,word[WORDLENGTH],*w=word;
00544                                                         while(isspace(*r))r++; while(isspace(*p))p++;
00545                                                         int ir0=0,ip0=0,ip1=0,j=0;
00546                                                         //Reactant:
00547                                                         for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*r);r++,w++) *w=*r; *w='\0';
00548                                                         for(ir0=0;ir0<nspecies;ir0++) if(strncmp(species[ir0].Id(),word,WORDLENGTH)==0) break;
00549                                                         if(ir0==nspecies){cerr<<"Boundary reactant not found for '"<<word<<"'\n";exit(1);}
00550                                                         //Products:
00551                                                         while(isspace(*p))p++;for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*p);p++,w++) *w=*p; *w='\0';
00552                                                         for(ip0=0;ip0<nspecies;ip0++) if(strncmp(species[ip0].Id(),word,WORDLENGTH)==0) break;
00553                                                         if(ip0==nspecies){cerr<<"Boundary products not found for '"<<word<<"'\n";exit(1);}
00554                                                         while(*p!='\0'&&isspace(*p))p++;
00555                                                         if(*p!='\0') {
00556                                                                 for(w=word;w-word<WORDLENGTH-1&&!isspace(*p);p++,w++) *w=*p; *w='\0';
00557                                                                 for(ip1=0;ip1<nspecies;ip1++) if(strncmp(species[ip1].Id(),word,WORDLENGTH)==0) break;
00558                                                         } else ip1=VOIDSPECIE;
00559 #ifdef ADSORPTION
00560                                                         boundary->reactions[ir0].Add(ip0,ip1,activationEnergy,probability,enthalpy,residencetime);
00561 #else
00562                                                         boundary->reactions[ir0].Add(ip0,ip1,activationEnergy,probability,enthalpy);
00563 #endif
00564                                                 }
00565                                                 tag=tag->next;
00566                                         }//end while
00567                                         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00568                                                 cout<<"Reactions between "<<nspecies<<" boundary species:\n";
00569                                                 for(int i=0;i<nspecies;i++){
00570                                                         Reaction *r=boundary->reactions+i;
00571                                                         Reaction::Outcome *o=r->First();
00572                                                         if(o!=NULL) {
00573                                                                 do{
00574                                                                         int ip0=o->Product(0), ip1=o->Product(1);
00575                                                                         REAL rate=o->Probability(), enthalpy=o->Enthalpy();
00576                                                                         if(rate>0.0) {
00577                                                                                 cout<<i<<':'<<species[i].Id()<<" = "
00578                                                                                         <<species[ip0].Id()<<" + "<<species[ip1].Id()
00579                                                                                         <<"; probability="<<rate<<", enthalpy="<<enthalpy<<endl;
00580                                                                                         cout.flush();
00581                                                                         }
00582                                                                 } while((o=r->Next())!=NULL);
00583                                                         }
00584                                                 }
00585                                         }
00586                                 }
00587                         }//END next
00588                 }//END if domain
00589         }//END cur
00590         xmlFreeDoc(doc);
00591         if(Run::option.verbose){printf("File %s parsed\n",inpfilename);fflush(stdout);}
00592         bulk.init(XMIN,XMAX);
00593         if(Run::option.restart)
00594                 load(filename);// load molecules from the gzipped data file:
00595         else
00596                 init();// initialize molecules according to bulk properties
00597 #ifdef LOCAL
00598         GridContainer::init(
00599                 XMIN, XMAX,
00600                 //-1.5*Potential::Cutoff(), // grid-cell-size: heuristic
00601                 GridContainer::cellsize,
00602                 pool
00603         );
00604         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug) {
00605                 if(Run::option.debug)cout<<"pool:"<<pool<<endl;cout.flush();
00606                 cout<<"GridContainer::init:molecules:"<<molecules.number()<<endl;cout.flush();
00607         }
00608         if(molecules.number()>0) {
00609                 molecules.goFirst();
00610                 do {
00611                         GridContainer::put(molecules.Current());
00612                         molecules.goNext();
00613                 }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
00614         }
00615 #endif
00616 }
00617 Domain::~Domain() {
00618         if(Run::option.debug) {cout<<"Deleting domain\n";cout.flush();}
00619 //+     delete pool;
00620 }
00621 void Domain::init() {
00622         double temperature=bulk.Temperature(),// get bulk temperature in K
00623                 volume=(double)bulk.Volume()*1e-27;// volume of the bulk in m^3
00624         List<Gas> *gases=&bulk.gases;
00625         int imolecule,nmolecules=0;//total number of molecules and current molecule counter
00626         if(gases->number()>0) {
00627                 gases->goFirst();
00628                 do {
00629                         Gas *gas=gases->Current();
00630                         Specie *specie=gas->specie;
00631 
00634                         double // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinetic_theory#Number_of_collisions_with_wall
00635                                 mu=(double)specie->Mass(),
00636                                 mass=(double)AtomicMassUnit*mu,
00637 //-                             Vav=sqrt(8.0*BoltzmannConstant*temperature/(PI*mass)),//! estimate average velocity
00638                                 //See eq. (2)
00639                                 energy=BoltzmannConstant*temperature,//convert temperature to energy
00640                                 Vavx=sqrt(energy/mass),
00641                                 density=(double)gas->density,
00642                                 totmass=density*volume;
00643                         int     nmol=(int)round(totmass/mass);
00644 
00645                         if(Run::option.verbose) {
00646                                 printf("Domain::init:Injecting %d molecules of specie %s into the bulk\n",nmol,specie->Id());
00647                         }
00648                         for(int inj=0;inj<nmol;inj++) {
00649                                 Molecule *molecule = bulk.inject((int)(specie-Species::species),Vavx,&molecules);
00650                                 molecule->Temperature(temperature); // set internal energy
00651                         }
00652                         gases->goNext();
00653                 }       while(!gases->isFirst());
00654         }
00655 }
00657 void Bulk::init(REAL xmn[], REAL xmx[]) {
00658         volume=1.0;
00659         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00660                 xmin[i]=xmn[i];xmax[i]=xmx[i];
00661                 volume*=xmax[i]-xmin[i];
00662         }
00663 }
00665 Molecule *Bulk::inject(
00666         int ispecie,
00667         REAL velx, // average velocity in one direction
00668         Collection<Molecule> *molecules
00669 ) {
00670         Molecule *molecule=molecules->append();
00671         molecule->Type(ispecie);
00672         molecule->Time(Run::time.current);
00673         REAL radius=0.5*species[ispecie].Size();
00674         molecule->TimeStep(velx>SMALL?radius/velx:0.0);
00675         //Select position:
00676         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00677                 // random coordinates inside a box:
00678                 REAL x=xmin[i]+RND*(xmax[i]-xmin[i]);
00679                 molecule->Coordinate(i,x);
00680                 //Select velocity from Gaussian:
00681                 REAL //- v=(2.0*RND-1.0)*velx;// uniform distribution
00682                         v=velx*GAUSS;// Gaussian distribution
00683                 molecule->Velocity(i,v);
00684         }
00685         return molecule;
00686 }
00687 void Domain::load(char *filename) {
00688         uLong   nbuf=MAXLINLEN*sizeof(int);
00689         Byte *buf=(Byte*)calloc((uInt)nbuf,1);
00690         gzFile gzinp;
00691         if((gzinp = gzopen(filename, "rb"))==NULL)
00692         {       cerr << "CAN'T OPEN "<<filename<<endl;cerr.flush();
00693                 exit(1);
00694         }
00695         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug)
00696                 cout<<"Reading from "<<filename<<endl;
00697         int nmolecules=0;//total number of molecules and current molecule counter
00698         while(true) {
00699                 char    *p;
00700                 gzgets(gzinp, (char*)buf,nbuf);
00701                 if((char)buf[0]!='#')break;
00702                 char *s=(char*)buf;
00703                 if((p=strstr(s,"time"))!=NULL){
00704                         p+=5;
00705                         while(isspace(*p))p++;
00706                         REAL starttime=0.0;
00707                         sscanf(p,"%lg",&starttime);
00708                         Run::time.current=starttime;
00709                         if(Run::time.start>starttime) Run::time.start=starttime;
00710                         if(Run::option.verbose) {cout<<"Start time="<<starttime<<endl;cout.flush();}
00711                 }
00712                 if((p=strstr(s,"output"))!=NULL){
00713                         p+=6;
00714                         while(isspace(*p))p++;
00715                         int ioutput=0;
00716                         sscanf(p,"%d",&ioutput);
00717                         IO::ioutput=ioutput;//DDD +1;
00718                         if(Run::option.verbose) {cout<<"Output dataset="<<IO::ioutput<<endl;cout.flush();}
00719                 }
00720                 if((p=strstr(s,"molecules"))!=NULL){
00721                         p+=9;
00722                         while(isspace(*p))p++;
00723                         int ioutput=0;
00724                         sscanf(p,"%d",&nmolecules);
00725                         if(Run::option.verbose) {cout<<"Number of molecules="<<nmolecules<<endl;cout.flush();}
00726                 }
00727         }
00728         int imolecule;// current molecule counter
00729         REAL ymin[DIM],ymax[DIM];
00730         if(nmolecules>0) {
00731                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00732                         ymin[i]=LARGE;
00733                         ymax[i]=-LARGE;
00734                 }
00735         } else {
00736                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)ymin[i]=ymax[i]=0.0;
00737         }
00738         REAL maxsize=0.0;
00739 //-             maxmass=0.0,
00740 //-             minmass=LARGE;
00741         for(imolecule=0;
00742                 imolecule<nmolecules&&!gzeof(gzinp);
00743                 imolecule++,
00744                 gzgets(gzinp, (char*)buf, nbuf)
00745         ) {
00746                 char *s=(char*)buf;
00747                 if(*s=='#') {imolecule--; continue;}
00748                 Molecule *molecule=molecules.append();
00749                 char id[WORDLENGTH];
00750                 sscanf(s,"%s",&id);
00751                 int type=-1;
00752                 for(int i=0;i<nspecies;i++) {
00753                         if(strncmp(id,species[i].Id(),WORDLENGTH)==0) {
00754                                 type=i;
00755                                 break;
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758                 if(type<0) {
00759                         cout<<"Unknown specie identifier "<<id<<endl;
00760                         exit(1);
00761                 }
00762                 molecule->Type(type);
00763 //-             REAL size=species[type].Size();
00764                 REAL size=species[type].Size();
00765                 if(maxsize<size)maxsize=size;
00766 //-             REAL mass=species[type].Mass();
00767 //-             if(maxmass<mass)maxmass=mass;
00768 //-             if(minmass>mass)minmass=mass;
00769                 while(!isspace(*++s));
00770                 while(isspace(*++s));
00771                 for (int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {//Read coordinates:
00772                         REAL x;
00773                         sscanf(s,"%lg",&x);
00774                         molecule->Coordinate(i,x);
00775                         if(ymin[i]>x)ymin[i]=x;
00776                         if(ymax[i]<x)ymax[i]=x;
00777                         while(!isspace(*++s));
00778                         while(isspace(*++s));
00779                 }
00780                 for (int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {//Read velocity:
00781                         REAL v;
00782                         sscanf(s,"%lg",&v);
00783                         molecule->Velocity(i,v);
00784                         while(!isspace(*++s));
00785                         while(isspace(*++s));
00786                 }
00787                 {       REAL e; //Read energy
00788                         sscanf(s,"%lg",&e);
00789                         molecule->InternalEnergy(e);
00790                         while(!isspace(*++s));
00791                         while(isspace(*++s));
00792                 }
00793                 {       REAL t,dt; //Read time and time-step
00794                         sscanf(s,"%lg",&t);
00795                         molecule->Time(t);
00796                         while(!isspace(*++s));
00797                         while(isspace(*++s));
00798                         sscanf(s,"%lg",&dt);
00799                         molecule->TimeStep(dt);
00800                         while(!isspace(*++s));
00801                         while(isspace(*++s));
00802                 }
00803 #ifdef DEBUG
00804                 if(Run::option.debug) {
00805                         cout<<imolecule<<": "<<id<<", x:";cout.flush();
00806                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00807                                 cout<<" "<<molecule->Coordinate(i);
00808                         }
00809                         cout<<imolecule<<", v:";cout.flush();
00810                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00811                                 cout<<" "<<molecule->Velocity(i);
00812                         }
00813                         cout<<endl;cout.flush();
00814                 }
00815 #endif
00816         }
00817         if(imolecule!=nmolecules) {
00818                 cerr<<"Number of molecules specified ("<<nmolecules
00819                 <<") does not agree with actually found ("<<imolecule<<")\n";
00820                 cerr.flush();exit(1);
00821         }
00822         if(Potential::lengthscale()>0.0) Potential::Cutoff(Potential::lengthscale());
00823         else if(maxsize>0.0)Potential::Cutoff(2.0*maxsize);//DDD
00824         else { cerr<<"BAD LENGTHSCALE\n";cerr.flush();exit(1);}
00825         if(Run::option.debug) cout << molecules.number()
00826                 << " molecules read. Interaction Cutoff = "<<Potential::Cutoff()<<endl;
00827         gzclose(gzinp);
00828 }
00829 int Domain::computeBounds(REAL x0[], REAL x1[]) {
00830         //computes domain bounds
00831         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00832                 x0[i]=LARGE;
00833                 x1[i]=-LARGE;
00834         }
00835         molecules.goFirst();
00836         int nmolecules=0;
00837         do {
00838                 Molecule *molecule=molecules.Current();
00839                 REAL *x=molecule->Coordinates();
00840                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00841                         if(x0[i]>x[i])x0[i]=x[i];
00842                         if(x1[i]<x[i])x1[i]=x[i];
00843                 }
00844                 molecules.goNext(); nmolecules++;
00845         }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
00846         return nmolecules;
00847 }
00849 int Domain::run(int niter) {
00850         int // determine the number of threads to use:
00851                 maxcounters=molecules.maxCounters();
00852         Run::nthreads=omp_get_max_threads();
00853         if(Run::nthreads>maxcounters) Run::nthreads=maxcounters;
00854         omp_set_num_threads(Run::nthreads);
00855         int *distribution=new int[nspecies];
00856         REAL currenttime=Run::time.current,
00857                 starttime=Run::time.start,endtime=Run::time.end;
00858         if (Run::option.debug)
00859                 cout << "Running "<< niter << " iterations ...";
00860         time_t  start_wtime=time((time_t) NULL);
00861         // Reindex molecules
00862         if(molecules.number()>0) {
00863                 molecules.goFirst();
00864                 int imolecule=0;
00865                 do {
00866                         Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current();
00867                         if(molecule->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE)molecule->index(imolecule++);
00868                         molecules.goNext();
00869                 }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
00870         }
00871         REAL maxjump=0.5*GridContainer::cellsize;
00872         int iter=0;
00874         for(;iter<niter&&currenttime<=endtime;iter++) {
00875                 Run::time.step=LARGE;
00876 #pragma omp parallel
00877                 { // begin parallel
00878                         int     ithread = omp_get_thread_num();
00879                         // SET THE GLOBAL TIME-STEP
00880                         molecules.goFirst(ithread);
00881                         do {
00882                                 Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current(ithread);
00883                                 int type=molecule->Type();
00884                                 if(type!=VOIDSPECIE&&molecule->index()%Run::nthreads==ithread) {
00885                                         REAL *v=molecule->Velocity();
00886                                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
00887                                                 if(v[i]>SMALL) {
00888                                                         REAL dt=maxjump/v[i];
00889                                                         if(dt<Run::time.step&&dt>SMALL)
00890 #pragma omp critical
00891                                                         {
00892                                                                 Run::time.step=dt;
00893                                                         }
00894                                                 }
00895                                         }
00896                                 }
00897                                 molecules.goNext(ithread);
00898                         }       while(!molecules.isFirst(ithread));
00899                 }// end parallel
00900                 Run::time.next=Run::time.current+Run::time.step;// set next time-level
00901                 int nmolecules=0;
00902                 //DO UNTIL ALL MOLECULES HAVE PASSED THE NEXT TIME LEVEL
00903                 while(molecules.number()>0) {
00904                         molecules.goFirst();
00905                         //TIME STEP:
00906                         molecules.goFirst();
00907                         do {
00908                                 Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current();
00909                                 int type=molecule->Type();
00910                                 if(type!=VOIDSPECIE&&molecule->Time()<Run::time.next) {
00911 #ifdef ADSORPTION
00912                                         if(molecule->ReleaseTime()<=currenttime) {
00913 #endif
00914                                                 molecule->Move();
00915                                                 int newmolecules=boundary(molecule);
00916                                                 type=molecule->Type();
00917                                                 if(type==VOIDSPECIE) {
00918                                                         Container<Molecule> *gridmolecules=GridContainer::nodes+molecule->GridCell();
00919                                                         Ptr<Molecule> *ptr=molecule->getPtr();
00920                                                         if(!gridmolecules->remove(ptr)) {//remove from the grid
00921                                                                 cout<<"Failed to remove node from the grid array\n";
00922                                                                 exit(1);
00923                                                         }
00924                                                         molecule->putPtr(NULL);
00925                                                         molecules.remove0();
00926                                                         if(molecules.number()==0) break;
00927                                                 } else {
00928 //+                                                     while(newmolecules>=0) {
00929                                                                 GridContainer::put(molecule);
00930 //+                                                             molecules.goNext();
00931 //+                                                             newmolecules--;
00932 //+                                                     }
00933                                                         molecules.goNext();
00934                                                 }
00935 #ifdef ADSORPTION
00936                                         }
00937 #endif
00938                                 } else //endif VOIDSPECIE
00939                                         molecules.goNext();
00940                         }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
00941                         // CLEAN UP AND REINDEX
00942                         molecules.goFirst();
00943                         int nmoved=0;
00944                         nmolecules=0;
00945                         do {
00946                                 Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current();
00947                                 int type=molecule->Type();
00948                                 if(type==VOIDSPECIE) {// garbage collector
00949                                         Container<Molecule> *gridmolecules=GridContainer::nodes+molecule->GridCell();
00950                                         Ptr<Molecule> *ptr=molecule->getPtr();
00951                                         if(!gridmolecules->remove(ptr)) {//remove from the grid
00952                                                 cout<<"Failed to remove node from the grid array\n";
00953                                                 exit(1);
00954                                         }
00955                                         molecule->putPtr(NULL);
00956                                         molecules.remove0();
00957                                         if(molecules.number()==0)break;
00958                                 } else {
00959 //-                                     GridContainer::put(molecule);// put molecule to a cell on the grid:
00960                                         if(molecule->Time()>=Run::time.next)nmoved++;
00961                                         molecule->index(nmolecules++);// assign unique index
00962                                         molecules.goNext();// move on to the next molecule
00963                                 }
00964                         }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
00965                         if(nmoved>=nmolecules)break;
00966                         // SET DEFAULT MOLECULE TIME STEPS
00967                         // default is to the intersection to the next time level
00968 #pragma omp parallel
00969                         {//BEGIN PARALLEL
00970                                 int     ithread = omp_get_thread_num();
00971                                 molecules.goFirst(ithread);
00972                                 do {// assign default time steps for each molecule
00973                                         Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current(ithread);
00974                                         int type=molecule->Type(),imolecule=molecule->index();
00975                                         if(type!=VOIDSPECIE&&imolecule%Run::nthreads==ithread) {
00976                                                 REAL time=molecule->Time();
00977                                                 if(time<Run::time.next) {//molecule is behind next time level:
00978                                                         molecule->TimeStep(Run::time.next-time+SMALL);//push it over the next time-level
00979                                                         molecule->ready();
00980                                                 } else {//molecules is ahead of the next time level: wait
00981                                                         molecule->TimeStep(SMALL);//just move very slowly
00982                                                         molecule->done();
00983                                                 }
00984                                         }
00985                                         molecules.goNext(ithread);
00986                                 }       while(!molecules.isFirst(ithread));
00987                                 interaction(ithread); // find next collision point and do interaction 
00988                         } // end parallel
00989                         if(nmoved>=nmolecules)break;
00990                 } //end molecules.number()>0
00991                 //COLLECT STATISTICS
00992                 for(int i=0;i<nspecies;i++) {
00993                         distribution[i]=0;
00994                 }
00995                 REAL //Energy:
00996                         energy=0.0,//total energy
00997                         totalKineticEnergy=0.0,// kinetic energy
00998                         totalInternalEnergyPdof=0.0,// internal energy per DOF
00999                         totalInternalEnergy=0.0;// internal energy
01000                 molecules.goFirst();
01001                 nmolecules=0;
01002                 if(molecules.number()>0)
01003                 do {
01004                         Molecule        *molecule=molecules.Current();
01005                         int type=molecule->Type();
01006                         if(type!=VOIDSPECIE) {// garbage collector
01007                                 //Compute statistics:
01008                                 REAL
01009                                         cp=species[type].Cp(),
01010                                         dof=DOF(cp),
01011                                         dofi=DOFI(dof),//internal degrees of freedom
01012                                         internalEnergy=molecule->InternalEnergy();
01013                                 totalKineticEnergy+=molecule->KineticEnergy();
01014                                 totalInternalEnergy+=internalEnergy;
01015                                 totalInternalEnergyPdof+=dofi>numeric_limits<REAL>::epsilon()?internalEnergy/dofi:(REAL)0.0,
01016                                 distribution[type]++;
01017                                 nmolecules++;
01018                         }
01019                         molecules.goNext();// move on to the next molecule
01020                 }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
01021                 energy=totalInternalEnergy+totalKineticEnergy;
01022                 REAL totalKineticEnergyPdof=onethird*totalKineticEnergy,// kinetic energy per DOF
01023                         totalEnergyPdof=totalKineticEnergyPdof+totalInternalEnergyPdof;
01024                 if(Run::option.xterm) {//DISPLAY
01025                         const int ncols=6;//number of output colums on the xterm screen
01026                         printf(
01027                                 "%c[HTime=%-9.3e Step=%-9.3e Memory=%d%% N=%d T=%-6.2fK E=%-9.3eJ K=%-9.3eJ I=%-9.3eJ%c[K\n",
01028                                 ESC,currenttime,Run::time.step,
01029                                 (int)(round(100.0*(REAL)nmolecules/(REAL)molecules.maxnumber())),
01030                                 nmolecules,
01031                                 twothirds*AtomicMassUnit*totalKineticEnergy/(BoltzmannConstant*(REAL)nmolecules),
01032                                 AtomicMassUnit*energy,
01033                                 AtomicMassUnit*totalKineticEnergyPdof,
01034                                 AtomicMassUnit*totalInternalEnergyPdof,
01035                                 ESC
01036                         );
01037                         int ispecie=0,jspecie=0;
01038                         while(ispecie<nspecies) {
01039                                 int icol=0;
01040                                 for(jspecie=ispecie;ispecie<nspecies;ispecie++){
01041                                         if(distribution[ispecie]>0) {
01042                                                 if(icol++==ncols) break;
01043                                                 printf("%%%-9s",species[ispecie].Id());
01044                                         }
01045                                 }
01046                                 if(ispecie<=nspecies)printf("%c[K\n",ESC);//ERASE END-OF-LINE
01047                                 icol=0;
01048                                 for(;jspecie<ispecie;jspecie++){
01049                                         if(distribution[jspecie]>0) {
01050                                                 if(icol++==ncols) break;
01051                                                 printf("%-9.5f ",100.0*(REAL)distribution[jspecie]/(REAL)molecules.number());
01052                                         }
01053                                 }
01054                                 if(ispecie<=nspecies)printf("%c[K\n",ESC);//ERASE END-OF-LINE
01055                         }
01056                         fflush(stdout);
01057                 }//endif xterm
01058                 currenttime=Run::time.next;
01059                 Run::time.current=currenttime;
01060                 injection();// inject new molecules across boundaries, if any
01061                 if(Run::time.output>0.0 && (int)floor(currenttime/Run::time.output)>IO::ioutput) {
01062                         IO::ioutput=(int)floor(currenttime/Run::time.output);
01063                         if(Run::option.verbose) cout<<"Writing output set "<<Run::outputname<<endl;
01064                         save(Run::outputname);
01065                 }
01066         }// endfor iter
01067         clock_t end_wtime=time((time_t) NULL);
01068         REAL elapsed_time=difftime(end_wtime,start_wtime);
01069         if (Run::option.debug)
01070                 cout << " elapsed time: "<<elapsed_time<<"s, time per iteration: "<<elapsed_time/(REAL)niter<<"s\n";
01071         if(currenttime>endtime) currenttime=starttime+currenttime-endtime; // if looping
01072         if(currenttime<starttime) currenttime=endtime-starttime+currenttime; //return 0;
01073         Run::time.current=currenttime;
01074         return iter;
01075 }
01076 int Domain::boundary(Molecule *a) {
01077         int newmolecules=0;// number of new molecules produced
01078         //PROCESS BOUNDARY CONDITIONS FOR PARTICLE a:
01079         REAL dx=0.0,
01080 //-             radius=0.5*species[a->Type()].Size(),
01081                 *x=a->Coordinates(),
01082                 *v=a->Velocity();
01083         int idir=-1, iside=-1;//inside
01084         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01085                 if(x[i]<=XMIN[i]) {idir=i;iside=0;break;}
01086                 if(x[i]>=XMAX[i]) {idir=i;iside=1;break;}
01087         }
01088         if(idir<0) return insideBoundary;
01089         dx=XMAX[idir]-XMIN[idir];
01090         Boundary *boundary=&boundaries[idir][iside];
01091         enum BoundaryTypes btype=boundary->type;
01092         switch(btype) {
01093                 case periodicBoundary:
01094                         // Periodic boundaries:
01095                         if(iside==0) x[idir]+=dx;
01096                         else         x[idir]-=dx;
01097 //                      for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01098 //                              REAL dx=xmax[i]-xmin[i];
01099 //                              if(x[i]<=xmin[i]) x[i]+=dx;
01100 //                              if(x[i]>=xmax[i]) x[i]-=dx;
01101 //                      }
01102                         break;
01103 
01104                 case elasticBoundary:// Elastic walls:
01105                         {
01106                                 v[idir]=-v[idir];
01107                                 x[idir]=2.0*bounds[iside][idir]-x[idir];
01108                                 //make sure that it did not escape from another side
01109                                 int jdir=-1, jside=-1;
01110                                 for(int i=1;i<DIM;i++) {
01111                                         int j=(idir+i)%DIM;
01112                                         if(x[j]<=bounds[0][j]){jdir=j;jside=0;break;}
01113                                         if(x[j]>=bounds[1][j]){jdir=j;jside=1;break;}
01114                                 }
01115                                 if(jdir>=0){
01116                                         v[jdir]=-v[jdir];
01117                                         x[jdir]=2.0*bounds[jside][jdir]-x[jdir];
01118                                 }
01119                                 if(!boundary->adiabatic) {
01120                                         // Update velocity to match wall temperature
01121                                         /* KE = 3*k*T/2 : kinetic energy
01122                                          * KE = m*v^2/2 : where 
01123                                          * v=sqrt(vx^2+vy^2+vz^2): velocity magnitude
01124                                          * v = sqrt(3*k*T/m)
01125                                          */
01126                                         Specie *specie=species+a->Type();
01127                                         REAL 
01128                                                 temperature=boundary->temperature,
01129                                                 mass=AtomicMassUnit*specie->Mass(),
01130                                                 energy=BoltzmannConstant*temperature,
01131                                                 newvel1=sqrt(energy/mass),//average velocity in one direction
01132                                                 newvel=newvel1*Sqrt3,//velocity magnitude
01133                                                 oldvel=0.0;
01134                                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)
01135                                                 oldvel+=v[i]*v[i];
01136                                         oldvel=sqrt(oldvel);
01137                                         if(oldvel>SMALL) {
01138                                                 REAL velratio=newvel/oldvel;
01139                                                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)v[i]*=velratio;
01140                                         } else {
01141                                                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)v[i]=newvel1;
01142                                         }
01143                                         // Set internal energy to correspond to wall temperature
01144                                         REAL 
01145                                                 cp=specie->Cp(),
01146                                                 dof=DOF(cp),
01147                                                 dofi=DOFI(dof);
01148                                         a->InternalEnergy(dofi*energy);
01149                                 }
01150                         }
01151                         break;
01152                 case openBoundary://kill the molecule:
01153                         a->Type(VOIDSPECIE);// mark for removal
01154                         return btype;
01155                 default:
01156                         cerr<<"Unknown BoundaryType "<<btype<<" encountered\n";
01157         }
01158         //Consider reactions:
01159         int ispecie=a->Type();
01160         Reaction *reaction=boundary->reactions+ispecie;
01161         Reaction::Outcome *outcome=reaction->First();
01162         if(outcome==NULL) return btype;
01163         REAL r=RND,//random number
01164                 probability=0.0;
01165         bool reacted=false;
01166         do {
01167                 probability+=outcome->Probability();
01168                 if(r<probability) { 
01169                         reacted=true;
01170                         REAL
01171                                 mAold=species[ispecie].Mass(),
01172                                 enthalpy=outcome->Enthalpy(),
01173 #ifdef ADSORPTION
01174                                 releasetime=outcome->Time(),
01175 #endif
01176                                 energy=a->KineticEnergy()+a->InternalEnergy()+enthalpy;
01177                         int
01178                                 typeA=outcome->Product(0),
01179                                 typeB=outcome->Product(1);
01180                         if(typeA<0||typeA>=VOIDSPECIE) {
01181                                 cerr<<"Can't locate specie type "<<typeA<<" for boundary reaction\n";
01182                                 exit(1);
01183                         }
01184                         Specie *sA=species+typeA;
01185                         REAL
01186                                 mA=sA->Mass(),
01187                                 cpA=sA->Cp(),
01188                                 /*      Total degrees of freedom are distributed between
01189                                         the translational dof:
01190                                         doft=3.0
01191                                         and internal dof:
01192                                         dofi=dof-doft=2*cp/R-5
01193                                         http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heat_capacity#Heat_capacity
01194                                 */
01195                                 dofA=DOF(cpA);//=2*cv/R=degrees of freedom
01196                         REAL    dofiA=DOFI(dofA),
01197                                         vA=LENGTH(v),//velocity magnitude
01198                                         keA=0.0,ieA=0.0;//internal energy of molecule A
01199                         if(typeB!=VOIDSPECIE) {//create new molecule
01200                                 Specie *sB=species+typeB;
01201                                 REAL
01202                                         mB=sB->Mass(),
01203                                         cpB=sB->Cp(),//heat capacity
01204                                         /*      Total degrees of freedom are distributed between
01205                                                 the translational dof:
01206                                                 doft=3.0
01207                                                 and internal dof:
01208                                                 dofi=dof-doft=2*cp/R-5
01209                                                 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heat_capacity#Heat_capacity
01210                                         */
01211                                         dofB=DOF(cpB);//=2*cv/R=degrees of freedom
01212                                 REAL    dofiB=DOFI(dofB),//check for physical consistency
01213                                         ke=energy>0.0?2*DOFK/(dofA+dofB)*energy:0.0,//total kinetic energy
01214                                         ie=energy-ke;//total internal energy
01215                                 keA=0.5*ke;//kinetic energy of molecule A
01216                                 REAL
01217                                         keB=keA,   //kinetic energy of molecule B
01218                                         dofi=dofiA+dofiB,
01219                                         ieB=0.0;//internal energy of B
01220                                 if(dofi>SMALL) {
01221                                         ieA=dofiA/dofi*ie;//internal energy of mol. A
01222                                         ieB=ie-ieA;//internal energy of molecule B
01223                                 }
01224                                 REAL
01225                                         m=mA+mB,
01226                                         vAnew=sqrt(2.0*keA/mA),
01227                                         vBnew=sqrt(2.0*keB/mB);
01228                                 if(vA>SMALL) {
01229                                         REAL c=vAnew/vA;
01230                                         MULC(DIM,v,c);
01231                                 } else {
01232                                         v[idir]=iside==0?vAnew:-vAnew;
01233                                 }
01234 //+                             Molecule *b=molecules.insert0();
01235                                 Molecule *b=molecules.insertAfter();
01236                                 //Rescale velocity to conserve energy:
01237                                 REAL
01238                                         *u=b->Velocity(),
01239                                         *y=b->Coordinates();
01240                                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++){
01241                                         y[i]=x[i];
01242                                         u[i]=0.0;
01243                                 }
01244                                 REAL    d=RND*vBnew*Run::time.step+0.5*(sA->Size()+sB->Size());
01245                                 if(iside==0) {
01246                                         u[idir]=vBnew;
01247                                         x[idir]+=sA->Size();
01248                                         y[idir]+=d;//separate the two molecules
01249                                 } else {
01250                                         u[idir]=-vBnew;
01251                                         x[idir]-=sA->Size();
01252                                         y[idir]-=d;//separate the two molecules
01253                                 }
01254                                 b->InternalEnergy(ieB);
01255                                 b->Type(typeB);
01256                                 b->Time(Run::time.current);
01257                                 b->TimeStep(Run::time.next-Run::time.current+SMALL);
01258                                 b->ready();//DDD
01259 #ifdef ADSORPTION
01260                                 if(residencetime>SMALL) q->ReleaseTime(Run::time.current+time);// halt the molecule for time 'time'
01261 #endif
01262                                 newmolecules++;
01263                         } else {//only one product
01264                                 //Rescale velocity to conserve energy:
01265                                 keA=energy>0.0?DOFK/dofA*energy:0.0;// kinetic energy
01266                                 ieA=energy-keA;//total internal energy
01267                                 REAL    vAnew=sqrt(2.0*keA/mA);
01268                                 REAL    d=RND*vAnew*Run::time.step+(sA->Size());
01269                                 if(vA>SMALL) {
01270                                         REAL c=vAnew/vA;
01271                                         MULC(DIM,v,c);
01272                                 } else {
01273                                         v[idir]=iside==0?vAnew:-vAnew;
01274                                         if(iside==0) {
01275                                                 x[idir]+=d;//separate the two molecules
01276                                         } else {
01277                                                 x[idir]-=d;//separate the two molecules
01278                                         }
01279                                 }
01280                         }
01281                         a->InternalEnergy(ieA);
01282                         a->Type(typeA);
01283 #ifdef ADSORPTION
01284                         if(residencetime>SMALL) a->ReleaseTime(Run::time.current+time);// halt the molecule for time 'time'
01285 #endif
01286                 }
01287         }       while(reacted==false&&(outcome=reaction->Next())!=NULL);
01288         return newmolecules;
01289 }
01291 void Domain::injection() {
01292         REAL dt=(REAL)Run::time.step*1e-9;
01293 
01294         for(int idir=0;idir<DIM;idir++)
01295         for(int iside=0;iside<2;iside++) {
01296                 Boundary *boundary=&boundaries[idir][iside];
01297                 REAL area=1.0e-18*(REAL)boundary->area,
01298                         temperature=boundary->temperature;
01299                 List<Gas> *gases=&boundary->gases;
01300                 if(gases->number()>0) {
01301                         gases->goFirst();
01302                         do {
01303                                 Gas *gas=gases->Current();
01304                                 Specie *specie=gas->specie;
01305 
01310                                 REAL // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinetic_theory#Number_of_collisions_with_wall
01311                                         mu=(REAL)specie->Mass(),
01312                                         mass=AtomicMassUnit*mu,
01313                                         den=(REAL)gas->density,
01314                                         energy=BoltzmannConstant*temperature,// energy per degree of freedom
01315                                         Vavx=sqrt(energy/mass),// average velocity in one direction
01316 //-                                     freq=den*velx/(2.0*mass),//! estimate collision frequency per unit area
01317                                         freq=den*Vavx/(2.0*mass),
01318                                         totinj=freq*area*dt,
01319                                         wholeinj=floor(totinj),
01320                                         fracinj=totinj-wholeinj;
01321 
01322                                 Molecule *molecule=NULL;
01323                                 int ninj=(int)wholeinj;
01324                                 for(int inj=0;inj<ninj;inj++) {
01325                                         boundary->Inject((int)(specie-Species::species),Vavx,temperature,&molecules);
01326                                 }
01328                                 if(RND<=fracinj) {
01329                                         boundary->Inject((int)(specie-Species::species),Vavx,temperature,&molecules);
01330                                 }
01331                                 gases->goNext();
01332                         }       while(!gases->isFirst());
01333                 }
01334         }
01335 }
01336 #ifdef LOCAL // ACCELERATION BY USING LOCAL INTERACTION MODEL: NO COLLISION DETECTION YET
01337 void Domain::interaction() {
01338         using namespace GridContainer;
01339         // Interaction of molecules a and b:
01340         int gridcell[DIM];
01341         REAL dx[DIM];
01342         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) dx[i]=XMAX[i]-XMIN[i];
01343         for(int ix=1;ix<ncells[0]-1;ix++) { gridcell[0]=ix;
01344         for(int iy=1;iy<ncells[1]-1;iy++) { gridcell[1]=iy;
01345         for(int iz=1;iz<ncells[2]-1;iz++) { gridcell[2]=iz;
01346                 int icell=index(gridcell);
01347                 Container<Molecule> *particles=nodes+icell;
01348                 if(particles->number()==0) continue;
01349                 particles->setFirstLast();
01350                 do {
01351                         Molecule *a=particles->First();
01352                         if(a->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE) {
01353                                 Interaction status=missed;
01354                                 //Interact with the particles from the same GridContainer cell:
01355                                 if(particles->number()>1) {
01356                                         while (status==missed&&!particles->isLast()) {
01357                                                 particles->goNext();
01358                                                 Molecule *b=particles->Current();
01359                                                 if(b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE) {
01360                                                         status=interact(a, b);
01361                                                         if(status==annihalated) {
01362                                                                 if(b->Type()==VOIDSPECIE) {
01363                                                                         particles->remove(b->getPtr());
01364                                                                         b->putPtr(NULL);
01365                                                                         break;
01366                                                                 }
01367                                                                 else {
01368                                                                         cout<<"Molecule annihalated but not VOIDed!\n";cout.flush();exit(1);
01369                                                                 }
01370                                                         }
01371                                                 }
01372                                         }  // end while
01373                                 } //endif
01374                                 //Interact with the particles from adjacent GridContainer cells:
01375                                 int neibcell[DIM];
01376                                 for(int jx=-1;status==missed&&jx<2;jx++) { neibcell[0]=ix+jx;
01377                                 for(int jy=-1;status==missed&&jy<2;jy++) { neibcell[1]=iy+jy;
01378                                 for(int jz=-1;status==missed&&jz<2;jz++) { neibcell[2]=iz+jz;
01379                                         if(jx==0&&jy==0&&jz==0) continue;
01380                                         int jcell=index(neibcell);
01381                                         Container<Molecule> *neibs=nodes+jcell;
01382                                         if(neibs->number()==0) continue;
01383                                         neibs->goFirst();
01384                                         do {
01385                                                 Molecule *b=neibs->Current();
01386                                                 if(b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE) {
01387                                                         status=interact(a, b);
01388                                                         if(status==annihalated) {
01389                                                                 if(b->Type()==VOIDSPECIE) {//Remove from the grid:
01390                                                                         neibs->remove(b->getPtr());
01391                                                                         b->putPtr(NULL);//the molecule is still listed
01392                                                                         //in the molecules collection, and will be
01393                                                                         //removed from there in the time iteration loop
01394                                                                         break;
01395                                                                 }
01396                                                                 else {
01397                                                                         cout<<"Molecule annihalated but not VOIDed!\n";cout.flush();exit(1);
01398                                                                 }
01399                                                         }
01400                                                 }
01401                                                 neibs->goNext();
01402                                         }       while(status==missed&&!neibs->isFirst());
01403                                 }
01404                                 }
01405                                 }
01406                         }//endif VOIDSPECIE
01407                         particles->FirstNext();
01408                 }       while(!particles->isFirstLast());
01409                 particles->setFirst();
01410         }//end iz
01411         }//end iy
01412         }//end ix
01413 }
01414 void Domain::interaction(int icounter) {
01415         using namespace GridContainer;
01416         // Interaction of molecules a and b:
01417         int gridcell[DIM];
01418         REAL
01419                 nexttime=Run::time.next,
01420                 dx[DIM];
01421         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) dx[i]=XMAX[i]-XMIN[i];
01422         for(int ix=1;ix<ncells[0]-1;ix++) { gridcell[0]=ix;
01423         for(int iy=1;iy<ncells[1]-1;iy++) { gridcell[1]=iy;
01424         for(int iz=1;iz<ncells[2]-1;iz++) { gridcell[2]=iz;
01425                 int icell=index(gridcell);
01426                 Container<Molecule> *particles=nodes+icell;
01427                 if(particles->number()==0) continue;
01428 //-             int iparticle=0;
01429                 particles->setFirstLast(icounter);
01430                 do {
01431                         Molecule *a=particles->First(icounter);
01432                         int iparticle=a->index();
01433                         if(a->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE &&
01434                                 a->Time()<nexttime &&
01435                            iparticle%Run::nthreads==icounter &&
01436                                 !a->isdone()) {
01437                                 a->done(); // to prevent double calculations
01438                                 Interaction status=missed;
01439                                 {//First try the possible old target:
01440                                         Molecule *b=a->Target();
01441                                         if(b!=NULL&&!b->isdone()&&b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE){
01442                                                 if(!b->islocked()) {
01443 //+                                             while(b->islocked()); // this should replace the line above, but did not work (?)
01444                                                         b->lock();
01445                                                         status=interact(a, b);
01446                                                         if(status==annihalated&&b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE)
01447                                                                 b->Type(VOIDSPECIE);
01448                                                         b->unlock();
01449                                                         if(status!=missed){//Jump to the next molecule
01450                                                                 particles->FirstNext(icounter);
01451 //-                                                             iparticle++;
01452                                                                 continue;
01453                                                         } else a->Target(NULL);
01454                                                 }
01455                                         }
01456                                 }
01457                                 //Interact with the particles from the same GridContainer cell:
01458                                 if(particles->number()>1) {
01459                                         while (status==missed&&!particles->isLast(icounter)) {
01460                                                 particles->goNext(icounter);
01461                                                 Molecule *b=particles->Current(icounter);
01462                                                 if(b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE&&
01463                                                         b->Time()<nexttime &&
01464                                                         !b->isdone()) {
01465                                                         if(!b->islocked()) {
01466 //+                                                     while(b->islocked()); // this should replace the line above, but did not work (?)
01467                                                                 b->lock();
01468                                                                 status=interact(a, b);
01469                                                                 if(status==annihalated&&b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE)
01470                                                                         b->Type(VOIDSPECIE);
01471                                                                 b->unlock();
01472                                                         }
01473                                                 } // endif VOID
01474                                         }  // end while
01475                                 } //endif
01476                                 //Interact with the particles from adjacent GridContainer cells:
01477                                 int neibcell[DIM];
01478                                 for(int jx=-1;status==missed&&jx<2;jx++) { neibcell[0]=ix+jx;
01479                                 for(int jy=-1;status==missed&&jy<2;jy++) { neibcell[1]=iy+jy;
01480                                 for(int jz=-1;status==missed&&jz<2;jz++) { neibcell[2]=iz+jz;
01481                                         if(jx==0&&jy==0&&jz==0) continue;
01482                                         int jcell=index(neibcell);
01483                                         Container<Molecule> *neibs=nodes+jcell;
01484                                         int nneibs=neibs->number();
01485                                         if(nneibs<=0) continue;
01486                                         neibs->goFirst(icounter);
01487                                         do {
01488                                                 Molecule *b=neibs->Current(icounter);
01489                                                 if(b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE &&
01490                                                         b->Time()<nexttime &&
01491                                                         !b->isdone()) {
01492                                                         if(!b->islocked()) {
01493 //+                                                     while(b->islocked()); // this is better, but did not work (?)
01494                                                                 b->lock();
01495                                                                 status=interact(a, b);
01496                                                                 if(status==annihalated&&b->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE)
01497                                                                         b->Type(VOIDSPECIE);
01498                                                                 b->unlock();
01499                                                         }
01500                                                 }
01501                                                 neibs->goNext(icounter);
01502                                                 nneibs--;
01503                                         } while(status==missed&&!neibs->isFirst(icounter)&&nneibs>0);
01504                                 }
01505                                 }
01506                                 }
01507                         }//endif VOIDSPECIE&&iparticle%icounter==0&&!islocked
01508                         particles->FirstNext(icounter);
01509 //-                     iparticle++;
01510                 }       while(!particles->isFirstLast(icounter));
01511                 particles->setFirst(icounter);
01512         }//end iz
01513         }//end iy
01514         }//end ix
01515 }
01516 #ifdef HARDBALLS
01517 Interaction Domain::interact(Molecule *a, Molecule *b) {
01518         Interaction status=missed;
01519         int typeA=a->Type(), typeB=b->Type();
01520         if(typeA==VOIDSPECIE||typeB==VOIDSPECIE){
01521 #ifdef DEBUG
01522                 cerr<<"Wrong reactants species: \n"
01523                 <<"\tA: type="<<typeA<<", id="<<species[typeA].Id()<<endl
01524                 <<"\tB: type="<<typeB<<", id="<<species[typeB].Id()<<endl;
01525 #endif
01526                 return annihalated;
01527         }
01528         Specie
01529                 *spa=species+typeA,
01530                 *spb=species+typeB;
01531         REAL
01532                 *xa=a->Coordinates(), //coordinate of the point and it's periodic image
01533                 *va=a->Velocity(),
01534                 *xb=b->Coordinates(),
01535                 *vb=b->Velocity();
01536         REAL
01537                 ma=spa->Mass(),
01538                 da=spa->Size(),//radius of a
01539                 mb=spb->Mass(),
01540                 db=spb->Size(),//radius of b
01541                 d0=0.5*(da+db),
01542                 ta=a->Time(),
01543                 tb=b->Time(),
01544                 dtab=b->Time()-a->Time(),
01545                 dvab2=0.0,//approach velocity squared
01546                 dabt2=0.0,//time corrected distance squared
01547                 Dab[DIM],dab2=0.0;//distance between the molecules, its inverse, and its square
01548         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)
01549         {       REAL r=xb[i]-xa[i];
01550                 Dab[i]=r;
01551                 dab2+=r*r;
01552         }
01553         //Correct the distance for the case when molecules are at different times
01554         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++){
01555                 REAL dv=vb[i]-va[i];
01556                 dvab2+=dv*dv;
01557         }
01558         dabt2=dab2+dvab2*dtab*dtab;
01559         if(sqrt(dabt2)<d0) {//HARD BALL COLLISION: change velocities
01560 //-     if(sqrt(dab2)<d0) {//HARD BALL COLLISION: change velocities
01561                 REAL
01562                         m=ma+mb,mi=1.0/m,//total mass and its inverse (for efficiency)
01563                         dab=sqrt(dab2), dabi=1.0/dab,
01564                         d1[DIM],//unit vector in direction d
01565                         w[DIM],//CM velocity
01566                         ua[DIM],ub[DIM],//particle velocities
01567                                         // in CM coordinates
01568                         una,unb;//lengths of ua and ub
01569 //+                     uta2old=0.0,//tangential component of ua
01570 //+                     utb2old=0.0;//tangential component of ub
01571                 //Transfer to CM coordinates
01572                 for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01573                         REAL
01574                                 vak=(REAL)va[k],
01575                                 vbk=(REAL)vb[k],
01576                                 wk=mi*(ma*vak+mb*vbk);
01577                         ua[k]=vak-wk;
01578                         ub[k]=vbk-wk;
01579                         w[k]=wk;
01580                         d1[k]=Dab[k]*dabi;
01581                 }
01582                 //Project CM velocities on distance vector:
01583                 una=SCLP(ua,d1);
01584                 unb=SCLP(ub,d1);
01585 //+             for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {//compute tangential velocities:
01586 //+                     REAL du=ua[i]-d1[i]*una;
01587 //+                     uta2old+=du*du;
01588 //+                     du=ub[i]-d1[i]*unb;
01589 //+                     utb2old+=du*du;
01590 //+             }
01591                 if(una-unb>SMALL) {//to prevent molecule from locking on each-other
01592                         REAL //Compute Energy:
01593                                 ua2old=SCLP(ua,ua),uaold=sqrt(ua2old),
01594                                 ub2old=SCLP(ub,ub),ubold=sqrt(ub2old),
01595                                 keold=0.5*(ma*ua2old+mb*ub2old), //kinetic energy in CM
01596                                 ke=keold,//kinetic energy after collision
01597                                 ieold=(REAL)a->InternalEnergy()+(REAL)b->InternalEnergy(),
01598                                 ie=ieold,//internal energy after collision
01599                                 energy=keold+ieold;//total of two reacting molecules
01600                         status=collided;
01601                         //REVERSE VELOCITITES:
01602                         for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01603                                 ua[k]-=2.0*d1[k]*una;
01604                                 ub[k]-=2.0*d1[k]*unb;
01605                         }
01606                         //Consider reaction
01607                         Reaction *reaction=reactions+typeA*nspecies+typeB;
01608                         Reaction::Outcome *outcome=reaction->First();
01609 #ifdef DEBUG
01610                         int typeAold=typeA, typeBold=typeB;
01611 #endif
01612                         if(outcome!=NULL) {// Reaction occurs
01613                                 REAL
01614                                         r=RND, //+Potential::invdist(RND),//add quantum uncertainty
01615                                         probability=0.0;
01616                                 do {
01617                                         probability+=outcome->Probability();
01618                                         if( r < probability &&
01619                                                  energy >= outcome->ActivationEnergy()
01620                                         ) {//REACT:
01621                                                 typeA=outcome->Product(0);
01622                                                 typeB=outcome->Product(1);
01623 #ifdef DEBUG
01624                                                 if(typeA==VOIDSPECIE) {//always erase b:DDD: Do we really need this?
01625                                                         cout<<"typeA="<<typeA<<endl;
01626                                                         typeA=typeB; typeB=VOIDSPECIE;
01627                                                 }
01628 #endif
