01629                                                 if(typeB!=VOIDSPECIE) {
01630                                                         status=reacted;
01631                                                 } else {//remove molecule b
01632                                                         status=annihalated;
01633                                                 }
01634                                                 a->Type(typeA);
01635                                                 spa=species+typeA;
01636                                                 b->Type(typeB);
01637                                                 spb=species+typeB;
01638                                                 break;
01639                                         }
01640                                 }       while((outcome=reaction->Next())!=NULL);
01641                         }
01642                         REAL
01643                                 cpa=spa->Cp(),
01644                                 dofa=DOF(cpa),//=2*cv/R=degrees of freedom
01645                                 dofia=DOFI(dofa),//internal DOF for molecule a
01646                                 cpb=spb->Cp(),
01647                                 dofb=DOF(cpb),//=2*cv/R=degrees of freedom
01648                                 dofib=DOFI(dofb),
01649                                 dof=dofa+dofb,//combined degrees of freedom
01650                                 dofk=2.0*DOFK,//combined kinetic dofs
01651                                 dofi=dofia+dofib, //combined internal degrees of freedom
01652                                 rdofia=0.0, rdofib=0.0;//percentile ratios of idofs for each molecule
01653                         if(dofi>SMALL) {
01654                                 rdofia=dofia/dofi;//ratio of idofs for a
01655                                 rdofib=1.0-rdofia;// -"- for b
01656                         }
01657                         REAL // DOF in CM system:
01658                                 dofkc=3.0,//kinetic dof in CM system
01659                                 dofic=dofi,//internal dof in CM system
01660                                 dofc=dofkc+dofic,//total dof in CM system
01661                                 // Restitution coefficient (velocity damping factors):
01662                                 resa=1.0, resb=1.0;
01663                         if(status>=reacted) {//collision with changing mass:
01664                                 REAL
01665                                         manew=spa->Mass(),
01666                                         mbnew=spb->Mass(),
01667                                         enthalpy=outcome->Enthalpy();
01668                                 energy+=enthalpy; // increase the energy by reaction enthalpy
01669 #ifdef DEBUG
01670                                 if(fabs(ma+mb-manew-mbnew)>=SMALL) {
01671                                         cerr<<"Mass conservation violation in interaction:\n"
01672                                                 <<species[typeAold].Id()<<'('<<species[typeAold].Mass()<<") + "
01673                                                 <<species[typeBold].Id()<<'('<<species[typeBold].Mass()<<") = "
01674                                                 <<ma+mb<<" != "
01675                                                 <<spa->Id()<<'('<<spa->Mass()<<") + "
01676                                                 <<spb->Id()<<'('<<spb->Mass()<<") = "
01677                                                 <<manew+mbnew<<endl;
01678                                         exit(1);
01679                                 }
01680 #endif
01681                                 if(status!=annihalated) {
01682                                         if(energy>0.0) {//Redistribute energy among DOFs:
01683                                                         //Translational:
01684                                                 ke=dofkc*energy/dofc;//total kinetic energy of new molecules
01685 //-                                                     ke=dofk*energy/dof,//total kinetic energy of new molecules
01686                                                 ie=energy-ke;//total internal energy of new molecules
01687                                                 if(uaold>SMALL&&ubold>SMALL) {
01688                                                         REAL
01689 //-                                                             mratio=manew/mbnew,
01690 //-                                                             uanew=sqrt(2.0*(ke)/(manew*(1.0+mratio))),
01691 //-                                                             ubnew=uanew*mratio,
01692                                                                 uanew=sqrt(ke/ma),
01693                                                                 ubnew=sqrt(ke/mb),
01694                                                                 uaratio=uanew/uaold,
01695                                                                 ubratio=ubnew/ubold;
01696                                                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01697                                                                 ua[i]*=uaratio;
01698                                                                 ub[i]*=ubratio;
01699                                                         }
01700                                                 }
01701 //+                                             REAL
01702 //+                                                     dke=0.5*(ke-keold),//energy change for each molecule
01703 //+                                                     du2a=ua2old-uta2old+dke/ma,
01704 //+                                                     du2b=ub2old-utb2old+dke/mb;
01705 //+                                                     if(du2a>=0.0)
01706 //+                                                             resa=du2a/(una*una);
01707 //+                                                     else
01708 //+                                                             ie+=dke;
01709 //+                                                     if(du2b>=0.0)
01710 //+                                                             resb=du2b/(unb*unb);
01711 //+                                                     else
01712 //+                                                             ie+=dke;
01713                                                 a->InternalEnergy(rdofia*ie);
01714                                                 b->InternalEnergy(rdofib*ie);
01715                                         } else {//avoid negative energy: sqrt will fail
01716                                                 REAL
01717                                                         ea=rdofia*enthalpy,
01718                                                         eb=enthalpy-ea;
01719                                                 a->InternalEnergy(a->InternalEnergy()+ea);
01720                                                 b->InternalEnergy(b->InternalEnergy()+eb);
01721                                         }
01722                                 }       else {//fusion of two molecules with annihalation of b:
01723                                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) { ua[i]=ub[i]=0.0; }
01724                                         a->InternalEnergy(energy);
01725                                         b->InternalEnergy(0.0);
01726                                 }
01727                         }       else {//No reaction
01728 //-                             if(energy>0.0){//Redistribute internal energy among DOFs:
01729                                         ke=energy>0.0?dofkc*energy/dofc:0.0;//total kinetic energy of new molecules
01730 //-                                     ke=dofk*energy/dof,//total kinetic energy of new molecules
01731                                         ie=energy-ke;//total internal energy of new molecules
01732                                         if(uaold>SMALL&&ubold>SMALL) {
01733                                                 REAL //Recalculate velocities to match ke:
01734 //-                                             mratio=ma/mb,
01735 //-                                             uanew=sqrt(2.0*(ke)/(ma*(1.0+mratio))),
01736 //-                                             ubnew=uanew*mratio,
01737                                                 uanew=sqrt(ke/ma),
01738                                                         ubnew=sqrt(ke/mb),
01739                                                         uaratio=uanew/uaold,
01740                                                         ubratio=ubnew/ubold;
01741                                                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01742                                                         ua[i]*=uaratio;
01743                                                         ub[i]*=ubratio;
01744                                                 }
01745                                         }
01746 //+                                     REAL
01747 //+                                             dke=0.5*(ke-keold),//energy change for each molecule
01748 //+                                             du2a=ua2old-uta2old+dke/ma,
01749 //+                                             du2b=ub2old-utb2old+dke/mb;
01750 //+                                     if(du2a>=0.0&&fabs(una)>SMALL)
01751 //+                                             resa=du2a/(una*una);
01752 //+                                     else
01753 //+                                             ie+=dke;
01754 //+                                     if(du2b>=0.0&&fabs(unb)>SMALL)
01755 //+                                             resb=du2b/(unb*unb);
01756 //+                                     else
01757 //+                                             ie+=dke;
01758 //if(resa>1.0 || resb>1.0)printf("resa=%g, resb=%g, una=%g, unb=%g         \n",resa,resb);///DDD
01759                                         // Reset internal energies to match ie:
01760                                         a->InternalEnergy(rdofia*ie);
01761                                         b->InternalEnergy(rdofib*ie);
01762 //-                             }
01763                         }
01764 //+                     //REVERSE VELOCITITES:
01765 //+                     for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01766 //+                             ua[k]-=d1[k]*una*(1.0+resa);
01767 //+                             ub[k]-=d1[k]*unb*(1.0+resb);
01768 //+                     }
01769                         //TRANSLATE TO LAB COORDINATES:
01770                         for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01771                                 va[k]=(REAL)(ua[k]+w[k]);
01772                                 vb[k]=(REAL)(ub[k]+w[k]);
01773                         }
01774                 }//endif untilock
01775                 //Void collision Targets:
01776                 a->Target(NULL);
01777                 b->Target(NULL);
01778         }//endif d0<ra+rb
01779         else {//Estimate new time step:
01780                 REAL
01781                         *vb=b->Velocity(),va2=0.0,vb2=0.0,
01782                         dv2=0.0,dvi,// squared relative velocity, an velocity inverse
01783                         dV[DIM],// relative velocity vector
01784                         Xa[DIM],Xb[DIM];//new position vectors and distance vector between two molecules
01785                 // Compute the actual impact parameter
01786                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++){
01787                         REAL
01788                                 va0=va[i],
01789                                 vb0=vb[i],
01790                                 dv=va0-vb0;
01791                         dv2+=dv*dv;
01792                         dV[i]=dv;
01793                         Xa[i]=xa[i];
01794                         Xb[i]=xb[i];
01795                         va2+=va0*va0;
01796                         vb2+=vb0*vb0;
01797                 }
01798                 //Bring coordinates of two molecules to the same time
01799                 if(dtab>0.0)for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)Xa[i]+=va[i]*dtab;
01800                 else for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)Xb[i]-=vb[i]*dtab;
01801                 dab2=0.0;//find distance between the molecules at that time
01802                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++){
01803                         REAL r=Xb[i]-Xa[i];
01804                         Dab[i]=r;
01805                         dab2+=r*r;
01806                 }
01807                 REAL dab=sqrt(dab2);
01808                 if(dv2>SMALL) {
01809                         REAL
01810                                 d2=0.0,// actual impact parameter squared to be determined
01811                                 du=0.0,// distance projection on the velocity direction
01812                                 dx2=0.0,// squared distance between the molecules
01813                                 dvx=0.0,// approach velocity: projection of relative velocity on the distance
01814                                 U[DIM];// velocity direction vector
01815                         dvi=1.0/sqrt(dv2);// velocity inverse for normalization:
01816                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01817                                 REAL u=dV[i]*dvi;
01818                                 du+=Dab[i]*u; //distance projected onto the direction of velocity
01819                                 U[i]=u;//unit vector in the direction of relative velocity
01820                         }
01821                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01822                                 REAL
01823                                         r=Dab[i],//distance vector between the centers
01824                                         dx=r-SMALL,//to avoid  coincident centers
01825                                         dv=dV[i],//relative velocity
01826                                         du=U[i]*dab,//distance vector to the impact point
01827                                         di=r+du;//component of Dab[] normal to du: impact parameter vector (+ because U is directed opposite to d)
01828                                 d2+=di*di;//actual impact parameter squared
01829                                 dx2=+dx*dx;
01830                                 dvx=+dx*dv;
01831                         }
01832                         if(d0-SMALL>sqrt(d2)&&dvx>SMALL) {
01833                                 REAL dt=dx2/dvx,
01834                                         dta=a->TimeStep(),
01835                                         tb=b->Time(),
01836                                         tcolb=tb+b->TimeStep(),//old collision time of molecule b
01837                                         dtamin=0.5*species[typeA].Size()/sqrt(va2),
01838                                         dtbmin=0.5*species[typeB].Size()/sqrt(vb2);
01839                                 if(dtab>0.0)dt+=dtab;
01840 //-                             if(Run::time.step>dt&&dt>SMALL)
01841                                 REAL coltime=a->Time()+dt,//collision time
01842                                         dtb=coltime-tb;
01843                                 if(dt<a->TimeStep()&&dt>dtamin&&coltime<tcolb&&dtb>=0.0&&dt>dtbmin)
01844 #pragma omp critical //DDD should declare a protected instead
01845                                 {
01846 //-                                     Run::time.step=dt;
01847                                         a->TimeStep(dt);
01848                                         b->TimeStep(dtb);
01849                                         a->Target(b);//register b as a next collision partner of a
01850                                         b->Target(a);//and vice-versa
01851                                 }
01852                         }
01853                 }//endif dv2>SMALL
01854         }//end ESTIMATE TIMESTEP
01855         return status;
01856 }
01857 #else //NOT-HARD-BALLS: Lennard-Jones:
01858 bool Domain::interact(Molecule *a, Molecule *b) {
01859         bool collision=false;
01860         REAL
01861 //-             ra=0.5*a->Size(),//radius of a
01862                 *xa=a->Coordinates(), //coordinate of the point and it's periodic image
01863 //-             rb=0.5*b->Size(),//radius of ba
01864                 *xb=b->Coordinates(),
01865                 cutoffdistance=Potential::Cutoff(),
01866                 d[DIM],d0,d2=0.0;
01867         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)
01868         {       REAL r=xb[i]-xa[i];
01869                 d[i]=r;
01870                 d2+=r*r;
01871         }
01872         d0=sqrt(d2);
01873         if(d0<cutoffdistance) {
01874                 //Lennart-Jones interaction:
01875                 // Compute force between the particles and change
01876                 // particle velocity according to the force by
01877                 // Newton's law: ua+=force/mass*dt
01878                 REAL
01879                         dt=Run::time.step,
01880                         f=Potential::force(d0),
01881                         ma=species[a->Type()].Mass(),
01882                         mb=species[b->Type()].Mass(),
01883                         dva=f/ma*dt,
01884                         dvb=f/mb*dt,
01885                         *va=a->Velocity(),
01886                         *vb=b->Velocity();
01887                 for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01888                         REAL r=d[k]/d0;
01889                         va[k]+=dva*r;
01890                         vb[k]+=dvb*r;
01891                 }
01892                 collision=true;
01893         }
01894         return collision;
01895 }
01896 //ROLANDO: end of your function
01897 #endif
01898 #else // SIMPLE N^2 INTERACTION ALGORITHM:
01899 void Domain::interaction() {
01900         // Interaction of molecules a and b:
01901         REAL dx[DIM];
01902         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) dx[i]=XMAX[i]-XMIN[i];
01903         molecules.setFirstLast();
01904         do {
01905                 Molecule *a=molecules.First();
01906                 REAL
01907                         ma=a->Mass(),
01908                         ra=0.5*a->Size(),//radius of a
01909                         *va=a->Velocity(),
01910                         xa[2][DIM]; //coordinate of the point and it's periodic image
01911                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) {
01912                         REAL x=a->Coordinate(i);
01913                         xa[0][i]=x; // position of the point
01914                         if(x-XMIN[i]<0.5*dx[i])
01915                                 xa[1][i]=x+dx[i];//its periodic image
01916                         else
01917                                 xa[1][i]=x-dx[i];
01918                 }
01919                 molecules.goFirstNext();
01920                 while (!molecules.isLast()) {
01921                         Molecule *b=molecules.Current();
01922                         REAL
01923                                 mb=b->Mass(),
01924                                 rb=0.5*b->Size(),//radius of ba
01925                                 *xb=b->Coordinates();
01926                         for(int j=0;j<2;j++) {
01927                                 REAL d[DIM],d0,d2=0.0;
01928                                 for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++)
01929                                 {       REAL r=xb[i]-xa[j][i];
01930                                         d[i]=r;
01931                                         d2+=r*r;
01932                                 }
01933                                 d0=sqrt(d2);
01934                                 if(d0<ra+rb) { //HARD-BALLS COLLISION:
01935                                         REAL    m=ma+mb,
01936                                                 *vb=b->Velocity(),
01937                                                 d1[DIM],//unit vector in direction d
01938                                                 w[DIM],//CM velocity
01939                                                 ua[DIM],ub[DIM],//particle velocities
01940                                                                 // in CM coordinates
01941                                                 una,unb;//lengths of ua and ub
01942                                         //Transfer to CM coordinates
01943                                         for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++)
01944                                         {       w[k]=(ma*va[k]+mb*vb[k])/m;
01945                                                 ua[k]=va[k]-w[k];
01946                                                 ub[k]=vb[k]-w[k];
01947                                                 d1[k]=d[k]/d0;
01948                                         }
01949                                         una=SCLP(ua,d1);
01950                                         unb=SCLP(ub,d1);
01951                                         if(una-unb>0.0) {
01952                                                 for(int k=0;k<DIM;k++) {
01953                                                         va[k]=ua[k]-2.0*d1[k]*una+w[k];
01954                                                         vb[k]=ub[k]-2.0*d1[k]*unb+w[k];
01955                                                 }
01956                                         }
01957                                 }
01958                         } // end for j
01959                         molecules.goNext();
01960                 }  // end while
01961                 molecules.FirstNext();
01962         }       while(!molecules.isFirstLast());
01963         molecules.setFirst();
01964 }
01965 #endif
01966 void Domain::save(char *name) {
01967         char filename[MAXLINLEN];
01968         int nmolecules=molecules.number();
01969         if(nmolecules<=0) {
01970                 if(Run::option.verbose) cout<< "No molecules saved\n";
01971                 return;
01972         }
01973         sprintf(filename,"%s-%d.dat.gz",name,IO::ioutput);
01974         cout << "Saving task '"<<name<<"' into file: " << filename <<". Elapsed world time: "<<Run::elapsed()<<" sec"<<endl;
01975         gzFile out;
01976         if((out = gzopen(filename, "wb"))==NULL)
01977         {       cerr << "CAN'T OPEN "<<filename<<endl;cerr.flush();
01978                 exit(1);
01979         }
01980         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug)
01981                 cout<<"Writing "<<nmolecules<<" molecules to "<<filename<<" ... ";
01982         gzprintf(out,"# Data output %d at time %lg for number of molecules %d\n",IO::ioutput,Run::time.current,nmolecules);
01983         if(Run::option.verbose||Run::option.debug)cout<<"Number of molecules: "<<nmolecules<<endl;
01984         int imolecule=0;
01985         molecules.goFirst();
01986         do {
01987                 Molecule *molecule=molecules.Current();
01988                 if(molecule->Type()!=VOIDSPECIE) {
01989                         gzprintf(out,"%s",species[molecule->Type()].Id());
01990                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) gzprintf(out,"\t%lg",molecule->Coordinate(i));
01991                         for(int i=0;i<DIM;i++) gzprintf(out,"\t%lg",molecule->Velocity(i));
01992                         gzprintf(out,"\t%lg\t%lg\t%lg\n",molecule->InternalEnergy(),molecule->Time(),molecule->TimeStep());
01993                         //gzprintf(out,"\t%lg\n",molecule->InternalEnergy());
01994                 }
01995                 molecules.goNext();
01996                 imolecule++;
01997         }       while(!molecules.isFirst());
01998         gzprintf(out,"\n");
01999         if(imolecule!=nmolecules) {
02000                 cerr<<"Number of molecules specified ("<<nmolecules
02001                 <<") does not agree with actually found ("<<imolecule<<")\n";
02002                 cerr.flush();exit(1);
02003         }
02004         if(Run::option.verbose) cout << molecules.number() << " molecules written\n";
02005         gzclose(out);
02006 //-     IO::ioutput++;
02007 }
